{{flavour|A sphere of crystal, carried in place of a shield. Magic scintillates within its interior.}}

'''Orbs''' are a piece of equipment you can carry in your off-hand. Unlike [[shields]], they provide no defensive value, but come with one of several unique egos:

*[[Energy]] - Provides two sources of passive [[channeling]]
*[[Guile]] - Reduces [[willpower]] of both the wielder and their targets
*[[Light]] - Surrounds the wielder with a 3-tile [[halo]]
*[[Mayhem]] - May send enemies into a [[frenzy]]
*[[Wrath]] - Has a 20% of inducing [[berserk]] rage when the wielder attacks

Orbs will always spawn with one of the egos listed above. [[Randart]] orbs will always spawn with one of these egos.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], orbs could not appear as [[randart]]s. Also, three [[unrand]] orbs were introduced in this version (all formely staff unrands).
*Equippable orbs were added in [[0.28]].
